name: IP Portal
description: Take control over your IP. The IP Portal allows you to protect and license your ideas — art, music, likeness, and more — by dictating how your IP is used across the internet and in AI training. Unleash seamless monetization for your IP on your own terms.
label: Protect, license, and monetize your IP on your own terms
label_zh: 保护、许可并按您的条件利用您的知识产权
content_zh: 掌控你的知识产权。IP Portal 让你能够保护和授权你的创意——无论是艺术、音乐还是个人形象等——通过规定你的知识产权在互联网和AI训练中的使用方式。按照自己的条件，轻松实现知识产权的变现。

name: Inferless
description: Deploy any machine learning model in production stress-free with ultra-low cold starts. Scale from single user to billions and only pay when you use.
label: Deploy any machine learning models in minutes.
label_zh: 几分钟内部署任何机器学习模型。
content_zh: 轻松部署任何机器学习模型，实现超低冷启动。无论是单个用户还是数十亿用户，都能灵活扩展，并且只有在使用时才付费。

name: ツSupercut
description: ツSupercut is beautiful, simple and fast. Just record your screen, share instantly and look professional...with a little help from AI.
label: Record your screen, share instantly, look like a PRO
label_zh: 录屏，即时分享，展现专业风采
content_zh: ツSupercut 简洁、易用且快速。只需录屏，即可即时分享，并在 AI 的帮助下显得更加专业。

name: Zapier MCP
description: Zapier MCP gives your AI assistant direct access to over 8,000+ apps and 30,000+ actions without complex API integrations. Now your AI can perform real tasks like sending messages, managing data, scheduling events, and updating records.
label: Connect your AI to any app with Zapier MCP
label_zh: 通过Zapier MCP将您的AI连接到任何应用程序
content_zh: Zapier MCP 让你的 AI 助手可以直接访问超过 8,000 个应用和 30,000 个操作，无需复杂的 API 集成。现在，你的 AI 可以执行实际任务，比如发送消息、管理数据、安排日程和更新记录。

name: AI Voices by Asyncflow v1.0
description: Podcastle's AI Voices hub is the World's largest library of lifelike AI Voices, powered by our proprietary AI model called Asyncflow v1.0. Choose from 1000+ voices and turn text to speech in a matter of seconds.
label: Premium AI voice quality without the premium price tag.
label_zh: 高端AI音质，无需高端价格。
content_zh: Podcastle的AI Voices中心是世界上最大的逼真AI语音库，由我们自主研发的AI模型Asyncflow v1.0驱动。你可以从1000多种声音中选择，并在几秒钟内将文本转换为语音。

name: OTTO GOOGLE ADS
description: Launch high-converting campaigns in minutes—not days. OTTO automates setup, bidding, targeting & A/B testing, eliminating manual PPC work. Link your site, review AI-optimized drafts, and launch smarter ads with better results. Set your Google Ads to OTTO.
label: AI Google Ads – Launch Winning Campaigns & Make Money
label_zh: AI Google Ads – 启动成功广告系列 & 赚钱
content_zh: 几分钟内就能启动高转化率的广告活动，而不是几天。OTTO 自动化设置、出价、定向和 A/B 测试，省去了手动操作 PPC 的麻烦。只需链接你的网站，审核由 AI 优化的草稿，然后发布更智能、效果更好的广告。将你的 Google Ads 设置为 OTTO。

name: Jotform Boards
description: Unlike other task management solutions, Jotform Boards empowers you to resolve customer requests by syncing the forms, AI agents, documents, and workflows you’ve created to your board.
label: Generate kanban tasks from AI agent conversations and more
label_zh: 从AI代理对话等生成看板任务
content_zh: 与其他任务管理工具不同，Jotform Boards 可以将你创建的表单、AI 代理、文档和工作流同步到看板上，帮助你更高效地处理客户请求。

name: mcpt
description: mcpt by Mintlify is a managed registry for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers, which act as bridges between AI applications and external tools or data sources. Find and explore reliable, up-to-date MCP servers.
label: Managed registry for MCP servers
label_zh:
管理的MCP服务器注册表

---

直译结果：管理的MCP服务器注册表

意译结果：MCP服务器的托管注册表
content_zh: mcpt 是由 Mintlify 提供的托管注册表，用于管理 Model Context Protocol (MCP) 服务器。这些服务器充当 AI 应用程序与外部工具或数据源之间的桥梁。通过 mcpt，你可以找到并探索可靠且最新的 MCP 服务器。

name: Meilisearch AI
description: 🚀 Meilisearch is a superfast search engine for developers built in Rust. Our latest release introduces AI-powered semantic and hybrid search, blending full-text, semantic, and vector DB capabilities for smarter, faster results.
label: Boost relevance and UX with fast hybrid and semantic search
label_zh: 提升相关性和用户体验，采用快速混合和语义搜索
content_zh: Meilisearch 是一个用 Rust 语言开发的超快搜索引擎。最新版本引入了由 AI 驱动的语义和混合搜索功能，结合全文、语义和向量数据库的能力，提供更智能、更快捷的搜索结果。

name: DeepSeek-V3-0324
description: DeepSeek-V3-0324 is the significant, open-source (MIT) update to DeepSeek's V3 model. It improves coding abilities nearing Claude 3.7 Sonnet, plus reasoning improvements.
label: Code like 3.7 but open source
content_zh: DeepSeek-V3-0324 是 DeepSeek V3 模型的一次重要开源（MIT 许可）更新。它在编程能力上接近 Claude 3.7 Sonnet，并且在推理能力上有所提升。

name: new.email by Resend
description:
new.⁠email is for developers, marketers, designers, and anyone who wants to create beautiful emails using natural language.

Start by creating a template and refine it until it looks great and then test how your emails look in real life.
label: Build cross-platform emails using natural language.
label_zh: 使用自然语言构建跨平台电子邮件。
content_zh:
new.email 是为开发者、市场营销人员、设计师以及任何希望通过自然语言创建精美邮件的人设计的。

首先创建一个模板，不断优化直到满意为止，然后测试实际发送效果。

name: Break Me 2.0
description: Break Me is a fun little time-waster that helps you relax and clears your mind. It’s super simple—just mess around and, out of nowhere, it'll hit you with something you weren’t even thinking about. It’s weirdly addictive.
label: Interactive website to relax and clear your mind.
label_zh: 交互式网站，帮助你放松心情，清空思绪。
content_zh: Break Me 2.0 是一个有趣的小游戏，能帮你放松心情、清空思绪。玩法非常简单——随便捣鼓一下，它就会突然给你带来一些你完全没想到的东西。这种体验让人上瘾。

name: ChurnDog
description: Built for B2B SaaS, ChurnDog recovers lost revenue and prevents churn with automated workflows and real-time insights.
label: Recover lost revenue & keep more customers
label_zh: 恢复丢失的收入并留住更多客户
content_zh: 专为B2B SaaS设计，ChurnDog通过自动化工作流和实时洞察来挽回流失的收入并防止客户流失。

name: MailSnitch
description:
Trust is good. Tagging is better.
Automatically tag your email using Plus Addressing or Catch-All method. No manual effort – everything’s saved to history so you can see who’s behind unwanted spam (if you receive it to that tagged mail).
label: Tag your emails to see who’s selling it
label_zh: 为您的邮件添加标签，看看谁在销售它
content_zh:
信任固然好，但标签更可靠。
使用 Plus Addressing 或 Catch-All 方法自动为你的邮件打标签。无需手动操作——所有信息都会保存到历史记录中，这样你可以清楚地看到哪些人发送了垃圾邮件（如果这些垃圾邮件发送到了带有标签的邮箱）。

name: Indie Boosting
description:
We Distribute Your Products So You Can Focus On Building!
Ever heard of "Vibe Distributing"?
Just get your products listed and let our AI agents handle the rest.
Have your clones handle marketing, sales and support while you focus on the core product.
label: The first distribution network for solo founders
label_zh: 首个为独立创始人打造的分销网络
content_zh:
我们帮你分销产品，让你可以专注于开发！
听说过“氛围分销”吗？
只需将你的产品列出来，剩下的就让我们的AI代理来处理。
让这些AI代理负责营销、销售和支持工作，你则可以集中精力打磨核心产品。
